page.title: 01Overall View Of Block
page.content: {Overall View Of Block} The area is mainly a farming area with a number of villages ( Flockton, Overton, Middlestown and Netherton ) and several places of local beauty ( i.e. Coxley Valley and Stocks moor Common ). With little industry apart from Denby Grange Colliery and Earnshaw's timber yard, the villages are dormitory villages for people who work in the surrounding large towns. There is a great deal of industrial history ( old bell pits and railway lines both horse drawn and pulled by cable ). The area lacks any large shops and most of the shopping is done in the surrounding towns.
